channel.title: Max cb level
channel.description: I've been searching for this for a couple days and can't find anything. I have summoning on my server, and when its maxed out my cb level goes to 138. but when someone right clicks me, it says 126. in my weapons tab, it says 138. how would I fix it so people can see me as 138?

item.title: Max cb level
item.dc:creator: @kingcobra805 kingcobra805
item.description:
@kingcobra805 wrote:

public void getCombat() { int j = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerAttack]); int k = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerDefence]); int l = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerStrength]); int i1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints]); int j1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerPrayer]); int k1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerRanged]); int l1 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerMagic]); int j2 = getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerSlayer]); combatLevel = (int) (((double) (k + i1) + Math.floor(j1 / 2)) * 0.25D) + 1; double d = (double) (j + l) * 0.32500000000000001D + (double) (j2) * 0.12500000000000001D; double d1 = Math.floor((double) k1 * 1.5D) * 0.32500000000000001D; double d2 = Math.floor((double) l1 * 1.5D) * 0.32500000000000001D; if (d >= d1 && d >= d2 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d; } else if (d1 >= d && d1 >= d2 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d1; } else if (d2 >= d && d2 >= d1 && extraCb == 0) { combatLevel += d2; } else if (extraCb > 0) { combatLevel = extraCb; } }

it’s in your player class, it should work if not let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Max cb level

item.description:

I’ve been searching for this for a couple days and can’t find anything. I have summoning on my server, and when its maxed out my cb level goes to 138. but when someone right clicks me, it says 126. in my weapons tab, it says 138. how would I fix it so people can see me as 138?
